10.1109/BigData.2016.7840889.title: Quantifying moral foundations from various topics on Twitter conversations
10.1109/BigData.2016.7840889.author: Kaur, Rishemjit and Sasahara, Kazutoshi
10.1109/BigData.2016.7840889.paperMotivationText: Analysis of moral foundations in everyday moral situations, based on tweets.
10.1109/BigData.2016.7840889.paperContributionText: Based on LSA, the paper shows how the five MFs function in spontaneous conversations about moral violating situations.
10.1109/BigData.2016.7840889.paperResultsText: The 5 MFs are mutually related, however, Purity is the most distinctive MF while Care is the most dominant foundation in everyday conversations on immorality
10.1109/BigData.2016.7840889.dataDomainOtherText: everyday conversions on Twitter about morally loaded topics
